description: Generating offensive advantages: spacing, triggers, attacking mismatches.
Converting created advantages into high-value shots or actions.
Optimizing court spacing and movement; timing of cuts and fills.
Moving the ball quickly and unselfishly; beating defenses with the pass.
Fast, correct decisions: attacking closeouts, read and react play.
Attacking and defending with pace after change of possession.
Containing the ball, helping, rotating, and finishing defensive plays.
Forcing turnovers, speeding up opponents, and creating chaos.
Dominating the glass, winning 50/50 balls, and setting a physical tone.
Mastering BLOB/SLOB, end-of-game, and unique scenarios.
Instilling game-like competition and finishing plays under pressure.
Building habits of talking, leading, and holding teammates accountable.
Practicing recovery from mistakes and building mental toughness.
Focus on proper shooting mechanics, form, and consistency
Team defensive positioning, communication, and strategies
Dribbling skills, ball control, and change of pace
Fast break opportunities and quick scoring
Ball movement, player movement, and court vision
Offensive and defensive rebounding techniques
Basketball-specific fitness and endurance training
Building confidence, focus, and resilience
